CustomField.description: Significant +2% Variance found in at least one variance or Start Years do not equal one another
CustomField.formula: IF(OR((ABS((AeroPort_Total_RDE__c - Total_RDE__c) / (IF(AeroPort_Total_RDE__c + Total_RDE__c=0,1,(AeroPort_Total_RDE__c + Total_RDE__c)/2))) > 0.02),(ABS((AeroPort_Total_Recovery__c - Total_Recovery__c) / (IF(AeroPort_Total_Recovery__c + Total_Recovery__c=0,1,(AeroPort_Total_Recovery__c + Total_Recovery__c)/2))) > 0.02),(ABS((AeroPort_Total_Revenue__c - Total_Revenue__c) / (IF(AeroPort_Total_Revenue__c + Total_Revenue__c=0,1,(AeroPort_Total_Revenue__c + Total_Revenue__c)/2))) > 0.02),(ABS((AeroPort_Total_Capital__c - Total_Capital__c) / (IF(AeroPort_Total_Capital__c + Total_Capital__c=0,1,(AeroPort_Total_Capital__c + Total_Capital__c)/2))) > 0.02),(ABS((AeroPort_Total_COGS__c - Total_COGS__c) / (IF(AeroPort_Total_COGS__c + Total_COGS__c=0,1,(AeroPort_Total_COGS__c + Total_COGS__c)/2))) > 0.02)),"YES","No")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Significant +2% Variance found in at least one variance or Start Years do not equal one another
CustomField.label: Variance Found
